title: Instead of deleting threads...
body: I wish riot put half the amount of effort into fixing issues (like the matchmaker) as they do in deleting threads that call out problems for what they are - a shitty gaming experience.

replies.body: Riot is not in charge of the boards, the moderators who are all volunteers are in charge of managing the boards

That's really missing the point. Riot needs to put some effort into fixing issues, particularly the matchmaker. It would be great if they put in at least half as much effort as the snowflake brigade spends policing the boards.

Riot could care less about deleting threads. I mean the ones that visit the boards have the power to do so but 99% of the time it is the Volunteer moderation team that does all that.  I've only seen like one or two Rioters actually remove or lock threads.
I got news for you: software engineers dont moderate the boards.
Off topic. If we played a dice game where you and I take turns guessing a number from 1 to 20 then roll dice. Are you cool if you have to use and roll 2 d 10 to my d 20?
